item.title: Slapstick physics-based co-op extraction puzzle platformer Frog Sqwad announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Panic Stations has announced Frog Sqwad, a slapstick physics-based cooperative extraction puzzle platformer for up to eight players. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026. Playtest sign-ups are available now via the Steam page.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Storm The Sewers for the glory of the Swamp King! Swing, jump, catapult your friends, and eat eat EAT until you grow into a humongous Megafrog. A cooperative extraction puzzle platformer for up to eight players. Squad up with your frog friends for a friendslop party in this slapstick physics adventure!

Team Up With Friends

Join up to seven froggy friends in a physics-based slapstick bonanza. Use your sticky tongue to swing from pipes, solve physics puzzles, drag giant food through winding tunnels and catapult your friends, all for the glory of the ravenous Swamp King!

Find Food

Plunge into ever-changing Sewers full of hazards, weird creatures, creative challenges‚Äîand delicious snacks. Chomp down and grow bigger than your teammates. Eat enough and you‚Äôll swell into a round, rolling Megafrog!

‚Ä¶And Don‚Äôt Get Eaten

The Swamp King‚Äôs hunger grows with each passing day. Spend your well-earned Gold from successful runs on new physics toys and gadgets to give you an edge on future missions. Just make sure to meet your quotas, or you might end up as the Swamp King‚Äôs next meal!

Key Features

  • Lick Everything ‚Äì Use your tongue to lick your friends, swing from pipes, grab physics objects and pull them around, and even catapult things!
  • Extraction Loop ‚Äì Hop into The Sewers with your frog friends, gather food, and return to The Swamp to feed the Swamp King.
  • Daily Food Quota ‚Äì Make sure to hit the daily food quota to pass the day and satisfy the Swamp King.
  • Experiment With Physics ‚Äì Use anything you find in The Sewers to help you solve physics-based puzzles and platforming challenges.
  • Enemies ‚Äì The Sewers are a strange place, filled with all kinds of unusual creatures ‚Äì be on the look out!
  • Megafrog ‚Äì As you eat food, your frog will grow in size. Eat enough food to transform into a MASSIVE Megafrog with a BIG BOOMING VOICE. Roll around The Sewers in style.
  • Frogspawn ‚Äì If you take damage, you‚Äôll vomit up any food you‚Äôve eaten ‚Äì take damage on an empty stomach, and you‚Äôll transform into a pathetic frogspawn. You‚Äôll need a friend to help feed you.
  • Voice Chat ‚Äì Have a laugh with your friends over proximity chat while you play ‚Äì your frog‚Äôs mouth will animate as you talk.

We Think You‚Äôll Love Frog Sqwad If You Enjoy‚Ä¶

RV There Yet?, YAPYAP, PEAK, R.E.P.O., Content Warning, Lethal Company, Fall Guys, and more!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/slapstick-physics-based-co-op-extraction-puzzle-platformer-frog-sqwad-announced-for-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Demon Tides launches February 19, 2026 for PC, later for Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Open-world 3D platformer dated.

Open-world 3D platformer Demon Tides will launch for PC via Steam on February 19, 2026, followed by Switch at a later date, developer Fabraz announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Follow Beebz and her crew on a journey of self-discovery as they travel the vast oceans of Ragnar‚Äôs Rock.

Navigate the open seas and explore each distant structure, uncovering every hidden nook and cranny with your diverse, expressive move-set. Beat challenges or find hidden chests to collect talismans along the way that modify and even expand your abilities or switch up your drip with a plethora of discoverable outfits!

And never forget, you‚Äôre not alone in this journey! Compete with other players for speedrunning times by challenging their ghosts or tag a wall and share your message in the form of graffiti with the entire world!

Are you ready to conquer this kingdom and expose all of its mysterious secrets? Or will Beebz be crushed by what awaits her‚Ä¶ Only one way to find out!

Key Features

  • A deeply expressive platforming move-set that enables you to travel through the world in countless unique ways. Express yourself through your schmovement and get lost in the flow!
  • Travel the seamless, open ocean and reach any point of interest at blazing speeds! Explore each locale and figure out creative ways to beat challenges or reach certain areas!
  • Hang out on your mobile hub, the Floating Fashionista, to chill with your crew or buy new items of interest!
  • Discover hidden secrets and use context clues to unravel this world‚Äôs mysteries alongside the main story told through major, cinematic story events!
  • Place your own checkpoints wherever you want and return to them any time you meet your untimely demise.
  • Collect over 50 unique talismans that uniquely modify or add to your move-set! Get a paraglider to soar the skies, spawn a bubble to float in place indefinitely, change your spin form into a hookshot and so much more!
  • Acquire a ton of unique head gear, outfits and hair dyes to change up your appearance! With over 50,000 possible combinations there‚Äôs no shortage of drip.
  • Compete for the best completion times of each locale by racing other player‚Äôs ghosts! Get notified if your ghost was beaten to challenge them right back, may the best runner win!
  • Create and share graffiti that will appear in other player‚Äôs worlds! Make something pretty, hint towards a secret nearby or troll the players with lies you little rascal!

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/demon-tides-launches-february-19-2026-for-pc-later-for-switch
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Finji announces arcade game collection CorgiSpace for PC, now available
item.content:encoded:
Finji has announced CorgiSpace, a collection of small arcade video games. It is available now for PC and Mac via Steam and itch.io for $4.99 / ¬£4.29 / ‚Ç¨4.99.

To celebrate the launch, Finji also announced the start of a game jam named CorgiJam for game development enthusiasts to create other small games in the same spirit as the collection. It will run from December 10, 2025 until January 11, 2026, and wrap up with a stream on January 19, 2026 where part of the Finji team and to-be-announced guests will play and offer commentary on the games live.

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Here is an overview of the game, via Finji:

CorgiSpace is a collection of small and fun 8-bit games that have short legs on purpose.

CorgiSpace is a collection of arcade games created in the PICO-8 game engine. Each game has simple, approachable controls and can be enjoyed again and again.

CorgiSpace includes more than a dozen of small action, adventure, arcade, and puzzle games, which can be each thoroughly explored in under an hour, plus developer diaries about how each game was made. Some of the games can even save progress.

In CorgiSpace, players can experiment games like Kuiper Cargo‚Äîa run-based puzzle game where the right upgrades make all the difference as players deliver cargo and raise their guild rank. It also includes Cave of Cards‚Äîa mini rogue-like where players have to clear a cave full of killer mushrooms by setting off bombs and making new resources from poker hands.

Other inclusions are Mole Mole‚Äîa sokoban puzzle with a twist (the twist is bombs) and Dino Sort‚Äîa logic puzzle where every dinosaur has to be in just the right spot. That might be next to their favorite food (plants) or near their favorite food (dinosaurs). It also features Rat Dreams‚Äîa top-down souls-like with no walking, only dodge rolls, and many more.

Watch a set of trailers below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

CorgiJam Trailer

How to Make a Game Using PICO-8



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/finji-announces-arcade-game-collection-corgispace-for-pc-now-available

item.title: Big Hops launches January 12, 2026 for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
vAbout

Big Hops is a 3D platformer, action adventure with deep movement, fresh frog-tongue gameplay, where you can grow veggies to build paths forward!

You‚Äôll play as Hop, a young frog who‚Äôs been kidnapped from home by a trickster spirit called Diss. He has a mysterious, important mission and needs your help, but you just want to get back to your family‚Ä¶ After a bit of searching, a wiry old Raccoon offers to build you a way home if you can find a few Airship Parts. To build your Airship, you‚Äôll need to:

  • Infiltrate the Gulley Gang‚Äôs Hideout at the edge of a vast Red Desert.
  • Become a Bucko and save DrillCO‚Äôs Rigs Workers out on the Open Ocean.
  • Sneak past Haven cultists by spelunking under a Shattered Mountain.

Each World offers a self contained story. You‚Äôll meet a huge cast of characters, learn the conflicts of each world, and hopefully find some way to help. Will that help be altruistic or is it all selfish to get those sweet, sweet Airship Parts? Why did Diss really kidnap you? What‚Äôs the purpose behind the Dark Drips he keeps asking you to collect? And if you collect them all, will Diss really let you go home?

You‚Äôll need to play for yourself to answer all these questions, so consider backing to help us finish BIG HOPS strong! Next let‚Äôs talk about gameplay.

Character designs by Steven Sugar (background designer for Steven Universe and Owl House).

Frog Parkour

Movement is king in Big Hops and our kit goes deep. You can roll, dive, crouch jump, wall run, free climb, swim, belly slide, walk tightropes, pole swing, grind rails, ride minecarts and more. Everyone knows a great platformer starts with a great player controller and Hops‚Äô stacks up against the best-of-the-best.

You‚Äôll feel inspiration from Mario, Sonic Adventure, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Hat in Time, and more. And that‚Äôs all just Hop‚Äôs basic moveset‚Äî-from there we‚Äôve added a ton of froggy flavor and ways to build your own paths forward.

Tongue Gameplay

The core-mechanic in Big Hops is Hop‚Äôs versatile frog tongue! It‚Äôs cute, goofy, and adds a surprising amount of freshness to this action-puzzle-platformer

Your tongue is how you interact. Use your tongue to pull items to your hands, hookshot up walls, and tongue-swing your way to ridiculous speeds.

Doors, switches, corks, plungers, flowers, flingers, levers, and lick-picking are all quick work thanks to Hop‚Äôs tongue. You‚Äôll keep finding novel, goofy tongue interactions even over 10 hours into your playthrough.

Veggie Creativity

Deep movement and tongue-gameplay give BIG HOPS legs and a fresh flavor, but the real magic is using powerful Veggies to build your own paths through levels

You‚Äôll find new types of Veggies as you explore and each has a unique effect when you throw it down in the world. Let‚Äôs look at some examples:

  • Mushrooms become bounce pads to help clear hard jumps.
  • Acorns can grow vines around walls and ceilings to help you climb farther.
  • Balloons make temporary platforms and can stack to get serious height.
  • Oil Balls create hookshot points you can bounce off without losing speed.
  • Apples let you place your own tongue swinging points anywhere.
  • Cacti launch tightropes you can use to cross big gaps.

Since you can only hold one item at a time, Hop has a handy Backpack! As you play, you‚Äôll discover new Veggies and unlock more Backpack Slots to store them. You can open the Backpack any time, and using it in a stressful moment will slow down time so you can plan your next moves.

Collectibles

Collectibles are a genre staple and there are lots in BIG HOPS! We‚Äôve worked hard to give them all gameplay uses, so you never feel like you‚Äôre just checking off boxes

  • Earn Dark Drips to help with Diss‚Äô mysterious mission and unlock secrets.
  • Collect Dark Bits to earn gameplay modifying Trinkets for your backpack.
  • Buy Veggies and upgrade your Backpack, Wallet, and more at Drilson‚Äôs Depot.
  • Buy outfits, hats, and dyes to customize Hop‚Äôs look at Odette‚Äôs Outfitters.
  • Find and Identify real Bugs to fill your collection in Bugsy‚Äôs Conservatory.
  • Uncover Blueprints to build totally normal and not-at-all busted Gadgets.
  • Find Mixtapes to play on in-game on your Boombox or Hop-man.

Equipping Trinkets means decorating your Backpack!

Big Adventure

Something we‚Äôre proud of is how many different areas there are in Big Hops. As you explore the four main Worlds (Forest, Desert, Ocean, and Mountain), expect a lot of surprising offshoots like the Boneyard, Bucko Cove, Hydro Plant, and Gulley Gang HQ. All these different places to explore really make it feel like you‚Äôre on a grand adventure!

Inspirations

I [Chris Wade] started Big Hops in 2019 (6 years ago!!!) with a single goal of modernizing the 3D platformer genre. The design trend at the time of giving players real freedom and creativity in games like The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Spelunky, and Rimworld was so inspiring. Selfishly and jealously, I wanted to see emergent gameplay in my favorite genre.

Since then, Big Hops has become a maximalist game and taken on many more ideas and inspirations. Its mechanics, story, vibes, and humor draw on so many games and TV shows stretching back 40 years. Mario (64, Odyssey, Sunshine, and Galaxy) and Zelda (Breath of the Wild, Wind Waker, and Ocarina of Time) have both been huge influences. We also spend a lot of time talking about Sonic Adventure, Spelunky, Kingdom Hearts, Psychonauts, Avatar: The Last Airbender, Spongebob, and Steven Universe.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/big-hops-launches-january-12-2026-for-ps5-switch-and-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Beastro adds PS5 version, launches in spring 2026
item.content:encoded:
About

Welcome to Beastro! In this charming fusion of fantasy adventure, not all heroes wield swords‚Ä¶ Some prefer the spoon. And, sometimes to save the world you‚Äôve got to start with a really good meal.

Palo Pori is a beautiful and peaceful village of artisans and tastemakers. Beyond the village‚Äôs protective wall, darkness has begun to stir. Ravenous monsters have claimed the land and threaten to sink their teeth into this final morsel of hope and happiness.

Play as Panko, a young, talented chef, helping to run the local eatery. When Panko‚Äôs teacher goes missing, a mysterious visitor arrives with warnings of the dangers beyond the wall. It‚Äôs up to Panko to step up and take over the restaurant and tend to the ingredients and patrons. But that‚Äôs not all, Panko also finds himself serving the Caretakers, brave adventurers, sent to save the world. In this adventure, preserving peace starts in the kitchen!

From Town to Table

In Palo Pori, fresh is best! Gather ingredients and resources, care for animals and grow your own fruit and veg to build up your very own cozy town to table restaurant. Forage for wild herbs and unlock new seeds to grow to expand your meals.

Serving Your Community

Chop, flip, and sizzle your way through mouthwatering mini-games as you whip up delightful dishes for the townsfolk. Good food is always better with company, so work hard to improve your cooking and experiment with ingredients, to keep your patrons happy.

Tailor your restaurant to the tastes of your community, develop new meals, progress your know how through a skill tree and adjust the decor to increase your restaurant‚Äôs appeal.

Feed the Caretakers

You‚Äôll also need to feed the hungry Caretakers; these brave denizens of the land will venture out into the wilds to fight the ravenous monsters threatening the peace of Palo Pori. Each Caretaker hails from their own flavour region, affecting their own tastes and preferences: some like it bitter, some like it sweet and some are just looking to fulfil their craving of the day! Craft thoughtful meals and balance the flavour profiles to boost their spirits, sharpen their skills, and unlock new abilities. Because let‚Äôs face it‚Ä¶ Who can save the world on an empty stomach?

Delicious Deck Building

Now it‚Äôs time to put your meal to the test! This is where taste meets tactics. The dishes you serve will build your Caretaker‚Äôs deck ‚Äì each ingredient unlocking a card. And once they‚Äôve eaten, they‚Äôll venture into the wilds to fight the monsters. Upon their return, they‚Äôll recount their journey and play out their battles through a charming puppet theatre sequence. They might even bring you back some MONSTEROUS ingredients from their ventures. Fight the monsters in turn-based deck building combat, inspired by traditional trick-taking card games. Outplay the monsters, by matching their flavour magic or neutralising it with a balancing card. Add an enhancing card to power up your moves! Your magic can turn the tables!

Utilize the unique effects of your ingredients to put your enemies to sleep, blow away their cards, and more, but watch out, you‚Äôre not the only one with special abilities. If you‚Äôre not paying attention, you might get burned.

In this food-based fantasy adventure, it‚Äôs time to give peas a chance! ‚Äì Are you ready to get cooking?

Unlock the magic in food.

Watch a new trailer below.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/beastro-adds-ps5-version-launches-in-spring-2026
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: 32-player classic-adventure battle royale Scramble Knights Royale announced for Xbox Series, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Xbox Series

Compete against fellow knights to win the favor of the princess.

Funktronic Labs has announced Scramble Knights Royale, a 32-player classic-adventure battle royale where players compete against fellow knights to win the favor of the princess. It will launch for Xbox Series and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Funktronic Labs:

About

Welcome to Scramble Knights Royale! Compete against fellow knights in a 32-player classic-adventure battle royale. Be the last knight standing and win the favor of the princess!

Jump off the starting boat and sail on the back of a turtle towards the shore to begin your journey at the start of a new match.

Explore and Discover

Traverse an archipelago filled with life, puzzles, dungeons, and treasures! Every run is a unique adventure. Prepare by finding loot and completing quests as the ring closes to force every knight closer together.

Power Fantasy

Grow stronger with new weapons, armor, and accessories that you discover or purchase. Visit a blacksmith to spend your gems and upgrade your gear. Make strategic equipment choices to create powerful builds.

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Scramble It Out

When you‚Äôre face to face with another knight, you‚Äôll need to out-skill them in strategic combat with the build you forged. Every weapon has tons of different moves to master and the world is filled with fun environments to brawl in.

Key Features

  • Homestead ‚Äì Your home away from battle, decorate it with items as you progress and relax with your friends!
  • Get Your Drip ‚Äì Tons of customization options you earn from playing during different seasons.
  • Play Together ‚Äì Queue together in free-for-all, or team up when we launch duo queue later this year.
  • Online Split-Screen ‚Äì Play together in local cooperative split-screen online! Now you just need a friend to play with!
  • Cluck Around and Find Out ‚Äì If you die, you can watch the rest of the match as a chicken.

Watch the announcement trailer and first gameplay footage below. View the first screenshots at the gallery. Visit the official website here.

Announce Trailer

Announce Gameplay



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/32-player-classic-adventure-battle-royale-scramble-knights-royale-announced-for-xbox-series-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Devolver Digital, Deconstructeam, and Selkie Harbour announce Virtue and a Sledgehammer for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Therapy? How about a sledgehammer?

Publisher Devolver Digital and developers Deconstructeam and Selkie Harbour have announced action adventure game Virtue and a Sledgehammer. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Most people resort to therapy. But you chose the brave option. A sledgehammer.

In Virtue and a Sledgehammer, explore the remains of your hometown haunted by the android ghosts of your digitized neighbors. There won‚Äôt always be a clear path, so create your own by knocking down any structures that stand in your way.

It will be a painful journey, not only because of the assault from the robots that have taken over life in the mountains, but because of the memories you‚Äôll unearth‚Äîsometimes warm, but often traumatic‚Äîas you destroy the remnants of your childhood.

A game about family, traditions, and being a misfit.

20 Pounds of Physical Media

Wield your sledgehammer like an instrument of reckoning, swinging through the swathes of mechanical human facsimiles and the buildings they call home. But will violent catharsis salve your soul, or make the pain burn brighter?

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

A Narrative Experience at Heart

You can‚Äôt tear down the place you were born without awakening a few ghosts. The cinematic sequences of interactive fiction will reveal your fears, desires, and your family‚Äôs knotty web of virtues and flaws.

I Wish You Could Experience Life Without Pain

Flesh is a source of aches and tainted humors.

It‚Äôs only now, devoid of bones, devoid of hunger, that I can tell you‚Ä¶

I have never been happier.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer and Developer Introduction



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/devolver-digital-deconstructeam-and-selkie-harbour-announce-virtue-and-a-sledgehammer-for-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot
